relations.Description: Climate change scenario analysis implements sustainable energy projects to mitigate the impacts of climate change.

The water-energy nexus refers to the interdependencies and interactions between water and energy systems. It involves the understanding of the water requirements for energy production and the energy requirements for water treatment and distribution.
relations.Subject: water-energy nexus

relations.Description: The water-food nexus refers to the interconnections between water and food systems. It involves the understanding of the water requirements for agriculture and food production, as well as the impacts of food production on water resources.
relations.Subject: water-food nexus

relations.Description: The food-energy nexus refers to the interdependencies and interactions between food and energy systems. It involves the understanding of the energy requirements for food production, processing, and distribution, as well as the impacts of food production on energy consumption.
relations.Subject: food-energy nexus
